email_response.subject: Re: OPPORTUNITY: Satellite Upgrade technicians needed in Atlanta
email_response.body:
Hello,

Thank you for reaching out about the satellite upgrade project.

I do have a bucket truck available (2021 Ford F-550 with Altec boom) and I'm experienced with satellite installations.

However, I should be upfront - I don't currently have a spectrum analyzer. I've been meaning to invest in one but haven't made the purchase yet. I do have fiber splicing equipment and an OTDR if those would be useful.

Would this be a deal-breaker for the project, or is there any flexibility on the equipment requirements?

I can provide my insurance certificate if there's a chance to move forward.

Thanks,
Sarah Johnson
Field Tech Services
